page.title: 15BUILDINGS IN BOURTON
page.content: {BOURTON CHURCH}WAS BUILT IN THE 13TH CENTURY. IT HAS A SPIRE,QUITE SMALL AND IT ALSO HAS A GRAVEYARD. THERE USED TO BE A{SCHOOL}IN BOURTON BUT IT CLOSED IN 1975. AT THAT TIME THE NUMBER OF CHILDREN WAS 34. THE BUILDING IS NOW A HOUSE. {BOURTON HALL IS USED AS A SORT OF FACTORY. IT IS OWNED BY A COMPANY CALLED INGERSOLL AND THEY ARE ENGINEERS. THE HALL IS VERY BIG AND SURROUNDED BY GARDENS. THE{VILLAGE HALL}IS VERY STRANGE IN SHAPE, THE ENTRANCE HALL IS CIRCULAR. BOURTON HAS A FAIRLY NEW ESTATE CALLED SHUCKBROUGH CRESCENT. IT ALSO HAS A LOT OF OLD HOUSES BUT MOST ARE SOMEWHERE IN BETWEEN. QUITE A LOT OF THE NEWER BUILDINGS ARE BUNGALOWS.
